Posts.EditableText: I would like to use Quest to make a text adventures in French and Spanish (I'm a foreign language teacher).  The main text of pages work fine for this, but the link text does not allow for accents or other special characters.  Does anyone know of a way around this?  Is there another program might be better for this?  Thanks.

Posts.EditableText:
What link text do you mean?

Try using the HTML entity code. They are written as an ampersand, the letter, the accent, and a semicolon, so for example:
```
The caf&‌eacute;
```
Full list here:

http://sites.psu.edu/symbolcodes/codehtml/
